properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu
jina lako ni tukufu sana,
duniani na mbinguni
wewe watawala! (pia x2)
Nikiziangalia mbingu
kazi ya vidole vyako
Mwezi pia na nyota
Bwana umeratibisha wewe.
Wanyama wa porini, ndege,
samaki warukaruka!

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
(Njooni) njooni tumwimbie Bwana
Njooni tumwimbie Bwana,
yeye ameumba vyote
Njooni tumwimbie. x2
Njooni tuimbe na ngoma
piga na zeze vinanda
ametuumba njooni tumwimbie.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kaumba nchi
(kaumba wanyama),
samaki wa baharini
(rini na ndege).
Vyote hivyo vyapendeza
(ndeza kama nini)
njooni imbeni
(njooni tumwimbie).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mimea yote
(ameumba yeye),
nchi yote ikajaa misitu.
Chakula chao wanyama
(ni matunda yake),
nyama na ndege wanaruka
(ruka angani).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tazama mtu
(ndiye kitu gani),
hata wewe umkumbuke
(mbuke ee Bwana).
Na binadamu ni nani
(nani ee Bwana)
umwangazie
(kwa wema).
